history.narrative: Law 6-206 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 6-519, which was referred to the Committee on Public Services and Cable Television. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 18, 1986 and December 16, 1986, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on January 8, 1987, it was assigned Act No. 6-266 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
